byline.original: By JEN RENZI and LUISE STAUSS

abstract: Jen Renzi and Luise Stauss Domains interview with VSA Partners CEO Dana Arnett at his family's Chicago home, modernist, industrial structure converted into warm family home.
lead_paragraph: The designer Dana Arnett has created an urban oasis for his family and the neighborhood fauna.

headline.main: At Home With the Wildlife of Industrial Chicago

snippet: The designer Dana Arnett has created an urban oasis for his family and the neighborhood fauna.
